An eAIP in HTML format has no "amendment pages", as opposed to a paper AIP. Instead, the list provided below points to all changes that occurred in this Amendment. EAIP u HTML formatu nema "amandman stranica", za razliku od papirnatog AIP. Umjesto toga, na popisu su obuhvaćene sve promjene koje su se dogodile u tom Amandmanu. Un eAIP en format HTML ne contient pas de "page d'amendments", contrairement à l'AIP papier. La liste ci-dessous pointe vers tous les changements repris dans cet Amendement. Um eAIP no formato HTML não contém "páginas da emenda", contrariamente ao AIP em papel. A lista abaixo contém todas as alterações efetuadas nesta Emenda. Pretēji papīra AIP eAIP HTML formātā nav "grozījumu lapas". Tās vietā ir zemāk sniegtais saraksts, kas norāda uz visām izmaiņām, kas sastopamas šajā grozījumā.
